item.title: So Bolt Gave Me a Driving Score. Now I Have Questions.
item.description:
A few months ago I rented a Bolt van, and at the end of my trip I got a score: 97/100 for my driving style. Cool, I guess? But here’s the thing â€” I’ve been digging into the EU AI Act for my research, and this little number got me curious. Where does a system like this actually fall under the new rules?

I don’t have any insider info on how Bolt’s scoring works, so think of this as me working through the question out loud rather than any kind of legal verdict.
